chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 mini has a problem:

I am not satisfied with the product and, being within the time frame of my right to rescind, I would like to initiate a return on the phone to receive a refund for the money paid for it.

Thank you,

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
YR
